mapper.select: /** * Query ID : transferTargetNameCheck * Description : 커넥트명 중복 체크 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I WHERE TRF_TRG_CNN_NM=#{trf_trg_cnn_nm}

/** * Query ID : selectTransfermappid * Description : TRF_TRG_MPP_ID 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT B.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I A,T_TRFTRGMPP_R B WHERE A.TRF_TRG_ID = B.TRF_TRG_ID AND A.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM=#{trf_trg_cnn_nm}
/** * Query ID : selectStatusTransferTarget * Description : 전송대상 상태 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT BW_PID FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I WHERE TRF_TRG_CNN_NM =#{trf_trg_cnn_nm}
mapper.delete: /** * Query ID : deleteTransferTarget * Description : 전송대상 삭제 * Author : 김주영 **/ DELETE FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I WHERE TRF_TRG_CNN_NM=#{trf_trg_cnn_nm}
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectMappingInfo * Description : 매핑정보 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT TMP.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM , TMP.TRF_TRG_ID , TMP.DB_NM , TMP.DB_SVR_NM , TMP.BW_PID , (SELECT DB_ID FROM T_DB_I WHERE DB_ID=TMP.DB_ID AND USEYN ='Y') FROM ( SELECT TD.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM,TD.TRF_TRG_ID,(CASE WHEN TD.DB_NM IS NOT NULL THEN TD.DB_NM ELSE '' END) AS DB_NM,S.DB_SVR_NM,TD.BW_PID,TD.DB_ID FROM (SELECT T.*,D.DB_SVR_ID,D.DB_NM FROM (SELECT SI.*, MR.DB_ID FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I SI LEFT OUTER JOIN T_TRFTRGMPP_R MR ON SI.TRF_TRG_ID = MR.TRF_TRG_ID ) AS T LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DB_I D ON T.DB_ID=D.DB_ID AND D.USEYN='Y' ) AS TD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DBSVR_I S ON TD.DB_SVR_ID = S.DB_SVR_ID AND S.USEYN='Y' WHERE TD.trf_trg_cnn_nm=#{name} )TMP

/** * Query ID : selectServerDbList * Description : 데이터베이스 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT S.DB_SVR_ID , S.DB_SVR_NM , I.DB_ID , I.DB_NM , I.DB_EXP FROM T_DBSVR_I S , T_DB_I I , T_USRDBAUT_I A WHERE S.DB_SVR_ID=I.DB_SVR_ID AND I.DB_ID = A.DB_ID AND S.DB_SVR_NM = #{db_svr_nm} AND A.USR_ID = #{usr_id} AND I.USEYN = 'Y' AND A.AUT_YN = 'Y'

/** * Query ID : selectServerDb * Description : DB,SERVER 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT D.db_id , D.db_nm , S.db_svr_id , S.db_svr_nm , C.ipadr , C.portno , S.dft_db_nm , S.svr_spr_usr_id , S.svr_spr_scm_pwd FROM T_DB_I D , T_DBSVR_I S , T_DBSVRIPADR_I C WHERE D.db_svr_id=S.db_svr_id AND D.db_id=#{db_id} AND D.USEYN='Y' AND S.DB_SVR_ID = C.DB_SVR_ID AND C.MASTER_GBN = 'M' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: /** * Query ID : insertTransferRelation * Description : 전송대상매핑관계 등록 * Author : 김주영 **/ INSERT INTO T_TRFTRGMPP_R ( TRF_TRG_MPP_ID , TRF_TRG_ID , DB_ID , CNR_ID , FRST_REGR_ID , FRST_REG_DTM , LST_MDFR_ID , LST_MDF_DTM ) VALUES ( nextval('q_trftrgmpp_r_01') , #{trf_trg_id} , #{db_id} , #{cnr_id} , #{frst_regr_id} , clock_timestamp() , #{lst_mdfr_id} , clock_timestamp() )
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectTrftrgid * Description : trf_trg_id 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I WHERE TRF_TRG_CNN_NM = #{trf_trg_cnn_nm}
/** * Query ID : selectTrftrgid * Description : trf_trg_id 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT TRF_TRG_ID FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I WHERE TRF_TRG_CNN_NM = #{trf_trg_cnn_nm}

/** * Query ID : selectTransferMapping * Description : 전송매핑테이블내역 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT I.TRF_TRG_ID , R.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID , L.TRF_TB_ID , I.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM , L.SCM_NM , L.TB_ENGL_NM , D.DB_ID , D.DB_NM , S.DB_SVR_NM FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I I , T_TRFTRGMPP_R R , T_TRFMPPTB_L L , T_DB_I D , T_DBSVR_I S WHERE I.TRF_TRG_ID=R.TRF_TRG_ID AND R.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID=L.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID AND R.DB_ID =D.DB_ID AND D.DB_SVR_ID =S.DB_SVR_ID AND D.USEYN='Y' and S.USEYN='Y' AND I.TRF_TRG_ID =#{trf_trg_id}
mapper.delete: /** * Query ID : deleteTransferRelation * Description : 전송대상매핑관계 삭제 * Author : 김주영 **/ DELETE FROM T_TRFTRGMPP_R WHERE TRF_TRG_MPP_ID =#{trf_trg_mpp_id}
/** * Query ID : deleteTransferMapping * Description : 전송매핑테이블내역 삭제 * Author : 김주영 **/ DELETE FROM T_TRFMPPTB_L WHERE TRF_TRG_MPP_ID =#{trf_trg_mpp_id}
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectBottlewaterinfo * Description : Bottlewater DB정보 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT S.DFT_DB_NM , C.IPADR , C.PORTNO , S.SVR_SPR_USR_ID , S.SVR_SPR_SCM_PWD , A.DB_ID , A.SCM_NM , A.TB_ENGL_NM , (SELECT TRF_TRG_CNN_NM FROM T_TRFTRGCNG_I WHERE TRF_TRG_ID= #{trf_trg_id}) AS TRF_TRG_CNN_NM , I.DB_NM , (SELECT CNR_NM FROM T_CNR_I WHERE CNR_ID=A.CNR_ID) AS CNR_NM FROM ( SELECT R.DB_ID,R.CNR_ID,L.SCM_NM,L.TB_ENGL_NM FROM T_TRFTRGMPP_R R,T_TRFMPPTB_L L WHERE R.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID = L.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID AND R.TRF_TRG_ID = #{trf_trg_id} )A, T_DB_I I, T_DBSVR_I S,T_DBSVRIPADR_I C WHERE I.DB_SVR_ID=S.DB_SVR_ID AND A.DB_ID=I.DB_ID AND I.USEYN='Y' AND S.DB_SVR_ID = C.DB_SVR_ID AND C.MASTER_GBN = 'M'

/** * Query ID : selectTblKafkaConfigInfo * Description : tbl kafaconfig 정보 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT L.SCM_NM , TB_ENGL_NM , I.TRF_TRG_CNN_NM , C.CNR_IPADR , C.CNR_PORTNO FROM T_TRFMPPTB_L L, T_CNR_I C,T_TRFTRGMPP_R R,T_TRFTRGCNG_I I WHERE L.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID=(SELECT TRF_TRG_MPP_ID FROM T_TRFTRGMPP_R R,T_TRFTRGCNG_I I WHERE R.TRF_TRG_ID = I.TRF_TRG_ID AND I.TRF_TRG_ID = #{trf_trg_id}) AND C.CNR_ID = I.CNR_ID AND I.TRF_TRG_ID = R.TRF_TRG_ID AND R.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID = L.TRF_TRG_MPP_ID

/** * Query ID : selectDbServerList * Description : DB서버 리스트 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT DB_SVR_NM FROM T_DBSVR_I A,T_USRDBSVRAUT_I B WHERE A.DB_SVR_ID = B.DB_SVR_ID AND USR_ID =#{usr_id} AND USEYN ='Y'
